name: Water Fight Jr
description:
Grab your water guns and mops and get ready to embark on a new adventure created by the award-winning studio HitGrab!

In Water Fight you control a team of kids armed to teeth with water guns, mops, water balloons and popsicles. Your kids must travel through backyards filled with vile, treacherous monsters made of mud. Earn money, get awesome weapons, unlock new powerful skills, defeat hordes of unique monsters and bosses!

Water Fight is Kid Friendly - we do not offer in app purchases for in game currency in this game!
Download now for free!
